---
title: "Plot networked data"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
df <- read.csv("test.csv")
df_long <- df %>% 
  pivot_longer(c("s", "e", "i", "r"))
```

Plot
```{r}
df_long %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=t, y=value, group=as.factor(node))) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~name)
```
